remarks: Multiply in the last term in a finite product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodp1s.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fprodp1s.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... ( N + 1 ) ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fprodp1s $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. ( M ... ( N + 1 ) ) A = ( prod_ k e. ( M ... N ) A x. [_ ( N + 1 ) / k ]_ A ) ) $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
